label: VerificationCallback
comment: Data structure for a call-back verification service. consumer provides an event structre to be verified, service returns that structure for the same event as known to the verifier together with a uniqu verificationID, date time stamp, and outcome

datatypeProperties.comment: The unique ID of of the verification created by the counter party.
The event data that is to be verified by the counter party
The dateTime stamp of the verification
The outcome of the counter party verification - returned by the verification callback end point.
